mainHero.title: IntelliBot
mainHero.subtitle: Unlocking Knowledge with AI
mainHero.description: Chatbots that understand and respond to customer queries using information extracted from PDF manuals, FAQs, and other documents.

items.description: Chatbots that understand and respond to customer queries using information extracted from PDF manuals, FAQs, and other documents

items.title: Document-Based AI Knowledge Bot
items.description: A bot that scans, indexes, and retrieves information from large collections of documents (PDFs, Word documents, etc.) to provide instant answers

items.title: Data Analyst Bot
items.description: With the ability to read complex tablets and analyst the information
